sentences.english: I rang again and a maid with a sullen face opened the door .
sentences.chinese: 我又撳了一下門鈴，一名侍女緊繃着臉把門開了。

sentences.english: The Handmaid's Tale is her sixth novel.
sentences.chinese: 《侍女的故事》是她的第六部長篇小說。

sentences.english: The maid lowered her chin and simpered.
Treat your wife like a servant-girl, you're a servant too.
sentences.chinese: 把自己的妻子當侍女，你也是僕人。

sentences.english: everything to me." So the ladies were obliged to go to him again.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，侍女們只得又到豬倌那兒去一趟。

sentences.english: Palace maid dark cry, but looking back on the sand pedestrians.
sentences.chinese: 漢宮侍女暗垂淚，沙上行人卻回首。

sentences.english: Love's handmaids are our life-long friends.
sentences.chinese: 愛的侍女是我們終身的朋友。

sentences.english: She 21)clutches at her head to stop the maid from pulling it out by the roots.
sentences.chinese: 女子抓住頭以防頭髮給侍女連根拔出。

sentences.english: The maid, still in tears, sniffed monotonously.
sentences.chinese: 侍女還在哭，發出單調的抽泣聲。

sentences.english: Love's handmaids are our life –long friends.
sentences.chinese: 愛的侍女是我們終生的朋友。

sentences.english: Before long, she was appointed second lady-in-waiting to the new dauphine.
sentences.chinese: 不久，她被任命爲新王妃的第二侍女。

sentences.english: Before long, she was appointed second lady–in-waiting to the new dauphine .
sentences.chinese: 不久，她被任命爲新王妃的第二侍女。

sentences.english: While living there I regarded myself as the handmaid of the Divine Mother.
sentences.chinese: 我住在那裏的時候，把自己看作是神聖母親的侍女。

sentences.english: Houyi i was told what was happening in the evening when he returned home from bumper hunting.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，后羿回到家，侍女們哭訴了白天發生的事。

sentences.english: Behold the handmaid of the moon.
Other figures in the temple include four eunuchs and a few female servants in men's clothes.
sentences.chinese: 殿內的彩塑侍從人物，有四名宦官及幾名男裝侍女。

definition: imperial concubine or palace maid/imperial secretary (old)
to attend to/to care for (patients etc)/to look after/to wait upon/to serve/also written 伏侍, see also 服事[fu2 shi4]
